title: The case of Mr. Hugh Peters, impartially communicated to the vievv and censure of the whole world: written by his own hand.
author: Peters, Hugh, 1598-1660.
publisher: printed for Sam. Speed, and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the Printing-Press in St. Pauls Church-yard,
